> <OLD>
>
> Hydras hissed in anmbigues way and his and his pets' eyes looked him
> carfully without show emotion

<NEW>

HYDRAS is lead off of his shuttle and into the larger ship that
belonged to these modern day PREDACONS. He was led down several halls
and through several very large and stout doors.

Finally he is lead through another set to be brought before the
presence of MEGASTORM.

http://tfwiki.net/w2/images2/4/47/MegastormModel.jpg

MEGASTORM is a massive robot standing as tall as HYDRAS but heavilly
armored. His chest shoulders and arms are thick and broad and his legs
were powerfully built as well. A large cannon was position over one
shoulder was mute testimony to the power that this creature held.

Turning to look at HYDRAS there was a strange look in MEGASTORM's
optics as he examined him. His optics looked at HYDRAS' frame, his
other heads as well as his PREDACON insignia.

"So you are a Predacon." MEGASTORM said, "Have you come to swear
loyalty to me or have you come to challenge my power?"

(TAG)

- Preston
